lines.text:
[repeated exchange]
The where and the when.
"Come here and have a sip of dreams with me. My spirit is free. I feel well, very well." Ray Milland, The Lost Weekend.

[both are watching a strip tease show at the Splendor]
Are you nervous?
Merry Christmas! Merry Christmas to all.
Well, these things only happen in Christmas. Merry Christmas!
No, no, I'm closing. I can't have the Splendor opened for a crazy projecionist and an idiotic critic.
